txt.en: You have defeated the Great Bull of Lamedon, making the lands safer for the people of this area.
An ancient and powerful ox roams the western fields of Lamedon's lush valley.
You have defeated the Great Bull
An ancient and powerful ox roams the western fields of Lamedon's lush valley.
You have defeated the Great Bull of Lamedon, making the lands safer for the people of this area.
An old, ornery ox, called the Great Bull by locals, can be found walking the lands of Lamedon's lush valley.\n\nYou should defeat the ox, for he frightens the folk of Lamedon.
